bpmn_info: The BPMN system is an integration system with your company's business, it has the skills to develop new applications, and allows you to create from the visual environment.
swagger_info: Swagger is an automatically generated API documenting tool for magic. It requires any standard Web API project and can generate stunning (and functional) documents without a user having to write a single extra line of documentation.
users_header1: This web page allows administrators to register new users.
users_header2: Users' e-mail addresses and usernames must be unique.
username_info: Spaces are allowed; punctuation is not allowed except for periods, hyphens, apostrophes, and underscores.
email_info1: A valid e-mail address. All e-mails from the system will be sent to this address.
email_info2: The e-mail address is not made public and will only be used if you wish to receive a new password or wish to receive certain news or notifications by e-mail.
pass_info1: Set the password for logging in to your account.
pass_info2: Password must be at least 8 characters, add lowercase letters, add capital letters, add numbers, add punctuation marks
role_info: Select the roles for this user
group_info: Select list of groups from which the user will be part
users_edit_info: This web page allows administrators to edit users.
role_header1: Roles allow you to fine tune the security and administration of BPMN. A role defines a group of users that have certains privileges asdefined on the permissions page.Examples of role include: anonymus user,moderator,administrator,and so on.In this area you will define the namesand order your roles from least permissive(anonymous user) to most permissive(administrator).
role_header2: By default BPMN come with some roles:
role_header3: Administrator user: this role is automaticaly granted to all logged in users
role_header4: Anonymous user: this role is used for users that don't have a user account or that are not authentificated.
role_create_info: The name for this role. Example: 'moderator', 'editorialboard'
group_name_info: Set name of this group. Example: 'Administrators', 'LegalEntity'
profile_name_info: Set the name for this profile
system_description: The primary goal of BPMN is to provide a notation that is readily understandable by all business users, from the business analysts who create the initial drafts of the processes, to the technical developers responsible for implementing the technology that will perform those processes, and finally, to the business people who will manage and monitor those processes. Thus, BPMN creates a standardized bridge for the gap between the business process design and process implementation.BPMN will also advance the capabilities of traditional business process notations by inherently handling B2B business process concepts, such as public and private processes , as well as advanced modeling concepts of entities and processes

system_multi_tenant_company_users_doc: Here you can manage the users who have been invited into your organization, you have the following activated functions, such as delete, activate, stop, change the password and some General information

iso_homepage_1p: ISO 27001  Expert is a specialized software for managing all the activities related to an Information Security Management System according to the ISO 27001 international standard. The system will help you in systemizing all the activities such as risk assessment, controls implementation, non-conformities management, asset management etc. and the related information security policies and procedures.
iso_homepage_2p: The software will provide you with a graphical overview of the level of compliance that the organization meets at a given time and will give you invaluable help in implementing and managing your Information Security Management System (ISMS) according to the ISO 27001 standard.
iso_homepage_about_project: The Expert Company, - OIL, S. R. L., with its registered office in the Municipality. Bucharest, sector 2 is implemented on the premises of the Municipality. Town, Read More RAILWAY street, Bl. 36/335, Scara B, Et Al.1, Ap.25 in the period of the 01.12.2016 – 31.10.2019, the project is “to Strengthen the position of the firm, Expert, Company, OIL, printing and marketing of the product innovation it is an Online ISO 27001 Information Security Management System (OIISMS) - > the market, & C”, which is financed by the Regional Operational Programme, priority Axis 2 - Enhancing the competitiveness of small and medium-sized enterprises investment Priority 2.1 Promoting entrepreneurship, in particular by facilitating the economic exploitation of new ideas and fostering the creation of new firms, including through business incubators, cod SMIS 109658. The Regional Operational programme is implemented at national level by the Ministry of Regional Development and Public Administration, as Managing Authority, and at the regional level by the Regional Development Agency of South Muntenia region, an Intermediate Body that monitors the implementation of the project.
iso_homepage_header_manage_your_iso: Manage your ISO 27001 compliance projects with ease.
iso_easy_to_use_text: ISO 27001 Expert software is web-based and very easy to use: no installation is required; minimum initial configuration is needed.
iso_covers_all_requirements_text: The software provides the tools for managing all the activities required by the ISO 27001 standard and the related documentation.
iso_pre_defined_templates_text: The software comes with predefined templates which will help even non-technical ISMS managers and consultants to achieve compliance with the ISO 27001 standard.
iso_key_features_text: ISO 27001 Expert software provides you an end-to-end aid in managing the compliance with the ISO 27001 standard.
iso_fully_costumizable: Fully customizable for the needs of any type of organization
iso_fully_costumizable_text_p1: The tool comes with predefined and recommended templates, but is fully customizable in order to suit the needs of any organization, from 1 employee to thousands of employees.
iso_fully_costumizable_text_p2: You can customize your risk matrix, risk assessment methodology, KPIs, controls, objectives etc
iso_fully_costumizable_text_p3: Also, the software can be used by companies which are now in process of implementing an ISMS according to the ISO 27001 standard, but can also be adapted by companies with existing ISMS.
iso_covers_all_processes: Covers all the processes required by the ISO 27001 standard
iso_covers_all_processes_p1: ISO 27001 Expert software will allow consultants or ISMS Managers to implement, improve, manage and maintain the ISO 27001 processes, such as:
iso_covers_all_processes_p4: - Information Security risk assessment and treatment
iso_powerful_dashboards: Powerful dashboards and ISO 27001 standard compliance checklist
iso_powerful_dashboards_p1: The software provides you a checklist for assessing the compliance with the requirements of the ISO 27001 standard in real time.
iso_powerful_dashboards_p2: Also, it comes with powerful dashboards which show you trends in the main Information Security areas and allow you to make quality decisions based on reports and graphical charts. The dashboards are fully customizable to fit your needs.
iso_endless_features_components: Endless Features & Components and more will be coming soon
iso_endless_features_components_text: We are constantly developing the application so as to permanently improve the application with new functionalities and to ensure compliance with the changes related to the ISO 27001 standard and particular needs of our clients.
iso_feature_role_based_text: The software is fully customizable and allows you to define roles such as ISMS Manager, Internal Auditor, ISMS Consultant etc. You can assign specific access rights to these roles.
iso_feature_document_management_text: With the help of this feature, you can organize your documents, keep them updated and have the opportunity to have an overview of the documentation in scope. Also, you can set up an approval flow for organizations that need different layers of approval in the document’s lifecycle.
iso_feature_notifications_text: With this feature, you will be able to be notified if you are assigned a task.
iso_feature_task_management_text: It allows the assignment of tasks to any persons, such as ISMS Consultant, IT Administrator etc.
iso_feature_real_time_chat_text: You can request real-time technical support from our team.
iso_feature_security_text: We take serious care about protecting your data and in this respect, we are currently performing ethical hacking tests of the system in order to prevent security breaches. We also implement state-of-the-art controls in maintain the security of the software.
iso_feature_flexible_customizable_text: Every section of the software has pre-defined views, but it allows the user to decide what information is displayed and how.
iso_feature_user_firendly_text: We struggled to achieve an intuitive and easy to use interface in order to meet the requirements if the ISO 27001 standard, but also to simplify your interaction with the system. In this respect, the information is usually recorded directly in the registers through in-line editing and not through intermediate pop-ups.
iso_feature_pre_defined_templates_text: The software comes with predefined templates which will help even non-technical ISMS managers and consultants to achieve compliance with the ISO 27001 standard.
iso_feature_manage_all_activities_text: The software provides the tools for managing all the activities required by the ISO 27001 standard and the related documentation.
iso_feature_action_plan_text: Powerful tool for defining and monitoring the status of the action plans coming from various sources: external audit, internal audit, management review, risk management etc.
iso_feature_full_support: Full support from our ISO 27001 experts
iso_feature_full_support_text: If you have challenges in implementing or maintaining your ISMS according to the ISO 27001 standard, you can receive specialized consulting services from our ISO 27001 consultants.
iso_price_plan_aditiotnal_services_text: For specialized ISO 27001 support from our consultants
iso_price_plan_please_describe_services: Please describe the services needed from our experts (e.g. review of your documentation, full ISO 27001 implementation, specific on-demand advisory etc.)
iso_demo_text: With the help of this feature, you can organize your documents, keep them updated and have the opportunity to have an overview of the documentation in scope.
system_commerce_no_payments: I don't have a place to pay
